name: generator-chiubaka-typescript-package
description: Yeoman generator for standard Chiubaka Technologies TypeScript packages for libraries and other such things.

scripts.build:copy: yarn run build:copy:templates && yarn run build:copy:generators
scripts.deploy: yarn run build && yarn run deploy:npm && yarn run deploy:generated
scripts.prestart: yarn run clean && yarn run build && npm link
scripts.pretest: yarn run clean && yarn run build
scripts.start: yarn run prestart && yo chiubaka-typescript-package --destination-root /tmp/generated-package --config config/generatedTypescriptPackage.yml
scripts.test:ci: yarn run test --ci --runInBand --coverage --reporters=default --reporters=jest-junit && mkdir -p reports/junit && mv junit.xml reports/junit/junit.xml

author: Daniel Chiu <daniel@chiubaka.com>

dependenciesComments.octokit: Official lib for interacting with GitHub APIs

devDependenciesComments.@chiubaka/eslint-config: Shared linting configs for the Chiubaka Technologies ecosystem
devDependenciesComments.@chiubaka/tsconfig: Shared TSConfig settings for the Chiubaka Technologies ecosystem
devDependenciesComments.@types/node: Types for NodeJS. Peer dependency of ts-node.
devDependenciesComments.copyfiles: Portable copy script to support build process
devDependenciesComments.husky: Modern native Git hooks made easy
devDependenciesComments.jest-junit: JUnit report formatter for Jest for compatibility with CircleCI test results format
devDependenciesComments.js-yaml: For parsing of YAML documents and more advanced testing of YAML files
devDependenciesComments.micromatch: Matching for glob patterns. Same lib used by a number of other dependencies including lint-staged.
devDependenciesComments.nock: For mocking responses to HTTP requests
devDependenciesComments.rimraf: Portable rm script to support clean script
devDependenciesComments.ts-jest: TypeScript preprocessor with source map support for Jest
devDependenciesComments.ts-node: To enable TypeScript configuration files for Jest
devDependenciesComments.yeoman-assert: Yeoman extensions for native assert module for utility in tests
